org.garret.perst.fulltext
Interface FullTextSearchable

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, ILoadable, IPersistent, IStoreable, java.io.Serializable
public interface FullTextSearchable
extends IPersistent

Interface for classes which are able to extract text and its language themselves.
